    • Vauxoo Tools¶

    odoo-network is an app to administer your servers inside Odoo.

    • Free software: BSD license
    • Documentation: http://apps.vauxoo.com/odoo-network.

    Features¶

    • ConfigGlue ready pre-procesed with minimal parameters to work with an openerp xml-rpc script.
